title: Tata Motors in legal battle with EPFO over pension fund transfer
description: Tata Motors is in a legal conflict with the EPFO over transferring its employee provident fund. Tata Motors seeks to surrender its exempted status, but EPFO requires detailed documentation. The Supreme Court ruling and subsequent legal actions have prolonged the issue. The matter is scheduled for a hearing in the Delhi High Court on August 8.
